LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.label: 小刀
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.description: One of humankind's oldest tools, the knife is both an everyday tool and a deadly weapon.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Bonesaw.label: 骨锯
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Bonesaw.description: Theres never a dull moment with a doctor armed with this and their favourite phrases at the ready. "Trust me! You won't feel a thing" And "Oops, is this supposed to bleed so much?"
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Machete.label: 宽刃刀
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Machete.description: Meant to be used for clearing path in dense jungles, Nowadays mostly used for clearing density from someone's shoulders.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Monkeywrench.label: 活动扳手
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Monkeywrench.description: A ginormous wrench, mainly used in spaceship maintenance but could technically be applied to mechanoid disassembly process.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Cleaver.label: 劈刀
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Cleaver.description: Tool designed to separate meat from bones and casting menacing shadows through shower curtains.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Shiv.label: 剃刀
